description: Boost your site's credibility with Aithenticate, the tool that brings transparency to AI content. Show your authenticity and earn your audience's trust.
title: Aithenticate - Transparency in Artificial Intelligence
introduction: Aithenticate is a plugin designed to enhance transparency and compliance regarding AI usage on websites. It provides a custom company profile, AI usage disclosure, and badges to indicate whether content is generated by humans or AI.
targetPeople: Website owners and content creators who use AI technology and want to ensure transparency and compliance.

faqs.question: Can I use the plugin on multiple sites?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are permitted to use the plugin across multiple sites. However, a separate account is required for each individual site to ensure proper management and functionality.

faqs.question: Is it mandatory to use your plugin to be compliant?
faqs.answer: No, using our plugin is not a mandatory requirement for compliance. To enhance transparency with your customers, you have the option to perform the necessary actions manually. While manual implementation is feasible, it is considerably more time-consuming. Our plugin is designed to streamline and simplify this process for you.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription or receive a refund?
faqs.answer: Subscription cancellations can be made at any time through your account settings. While cancelling prevents future charges, please note that refunds for previous payments are not offered. Upon cancellation, you will not incur any additional charges in subsequent months.

faqs.question: I don't use WordPress; can I still utilize your plugin?
faqs.answer: Certainly, our plugin can still be integrated into your website even if you do not use WordPress. The integration process involves manually embedding our code into your site, which is straightforward in most cases, typically requiring just a simple copy and paste of the provided code.

faqs.question: Is the plugin compatible with mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, our plugin is fully compatible with mobile devices. Once correctly installed and configured, it will be accessible and functional across all devices, ensuring a seamless user experience for your website visitors.
